field.name: description
field.value:
Add database column name parameter to KeyProperty attribute. Otherwise, KeyProperty attribute must have same name as database column.
From the email in the Castle Project users email list:
I mapped a model with a Composite Key, following the example given in the CompositeModel test (i.e. Agent, AgentKey, Group, etc.)
I was having problems retrieving this object. I found that the KeyProperties of the Composite key class must have the same name as the columns used in the database. For instance, OrgId in my database is Org_Id, so I neede to change my property names accordingly.
In the future, can an attribute be added to KeyProperty to define the column name?
